text: GK Permskie Medvedi is a Russian handball team located in Perm. Their home matches are played at the V.P. Sukharev Sport Complex. They compete in the Russian Handball Super League. ==Accomplishments== *Russian Handball Cup: **Winners (1) : 2014 ::Runners Up (1) : 2011 ==External links== * Category:Sport in Perm Category:Russian handball clubs
title: GK Permskie Medvedi
